note:
I'll be honest, I don't even know what to type here. I'm a 40 something mostly guy who has three kids and moved to Washington from Austin Texas. I work on web stuff and enjoy gaming stuff. I've been an AMD fanboy for about 25 years and I've worked there for more than 15.

I joined fedi back in the November 2022 influx thinking I'd have my work persona here and we see how that turned out, don't we? DMs open, follow requests require approval but I'm pretty open if you've got an interesting profile or a picrew tbh.

One other note. I block people who reply with #hashtags. Unless, of course, you're just being mischievous because of this note (I like that energy).
